attributes.action: let the poeple of the uk have the choice of prime minister by calling an election before 2009
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: let us the tax payers have a say who runs this country, give us back our democracy, like a national newspaper recently said,never have so few decided so much for so many.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
